abstract: New York Nets finalize their transition from East Rutherford, NJ, to Brooklyn with opening of new 70,000-square-foot training center; officially named Hospital for Special Surgery Training Center, practice site is in converted warehouse in Sunset Park area of Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Even after they left New Jersey over three years ago, the Nets continued to practice there. That changed on Wednesday with the opening of a new practice site in Sunset Park, Brooklyn.

headline.main: With Much Unsettled for Nets, Brooklyn Complex Is a New Center of Gravity
headline.print_headline: With Much Unsettled for Nets, Brooklyn Complex Is a New Center of Gravity

snippet: Even after they left New Jersey over three years ago, the Nets continued to practice there. That changed on Wednesday with the opening of a new practice site in Sunset Park, Brooklyn.
